translation: If you are unable to fix your mind steadily on Me, then seek to reach Me through the yoga of constant practice, O Arjuna.
commentary: 12.9 Then if? Chittam the mind? to fix to fix? Not not? Shaknoshi (thou) art able? Mayi in Me? steadily steadily? by the Yoga of constant practice? Then them? Maam Me? wish wish? aptum to reach? Dhananjaya O Arjuna.Commentary Abhyasa Yoga Abhyasa is constant practice to steady the mind and fix it on one point the practice of repeatedly withdrawing the mind from all sorts of sensual objects and
